message: http://tehpwngaming.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=161%3Alin7-01-2011&catid=47%3Alast-added-tutorilas&Itemid=56 Here we take a small gamble, branching out into movie reviews. Ernest Lin gives early feedback on Dark of the Moon, finding a better - but not altogether different - Transformers movie.
